WhatsApp Chat & Message Backup and Export | WPPME.COM is the ultimate solution for preserving WhatsApp chat history, images, and videos! Effortlessly backup WhatsApp messages, important conversations, and multimedia content with just a few clicks. Keep your digital life secure and organized by preventing data loss and ensuring easy access to your data anytime.

ã€Main Featuresã€‘
ğŸ”ºMedia Backup: Save all photos and videos from your WhatsApp account, ensuring valuable media files are never lost.
ğŸ”ºGroup Chat Backup: Select specific group chats for targeted backup of messages and media, making it easy to protect important group conversations.
ğŸ”ºContact-Specific Backup: Backup chats and media from chosen contacts, allowing for a customized data protection solution.
ğŸ”ºComplete Message History: Archive all WhatsApp messages in your account to HTML, CSV, JSON, or Excel, giving you flexible formats for data recovery or storage.
ğŸ”º Date Range Filtering: Backup messages from specific timeframes, simplifying management of chat history and retrieval of past messages.

ã€FAQsã€‘
- How to backup WhatsApp chat?
1 Open the extension and select the chat window you want to back up in WhatsApp, then choose any media files or specific date range if needed.
2 Choose your preferred format (HTML, CSV, JSON, Excel) and click to initiate the backup.

ğŸ”º Historia Kamili ya Ujumbe: Hifadhi ujumbe wote wa WhatsApp katika akaunti yako katika miundo ya HTML, CSV, JSON, au Excel, kutoa miundo rahisi ya urejeshaji au uhifadhi wa data.
